name: Deep Soul Trader
description:
A game for the gameJam: Mini Jam 109: Depth(s)

This is a game about a person/hero/whatever, who wants to explore the deep size of the world, literally going deeper in the world

In meanwhile it uses their soul in order to create weapons or tools that will help it to go even deeper, but if it uses much soul, it might be weak and the next hit may be fatal

The deeper it goes, the faster it runs in even less time

NOTE: If sounds don't play or doesn't respond to keyboard, click the game

Controls:

A - Change paths

S - Stab (useful when you have shield and want points)

D - Use potion (if have)

F - Craft menu (open and close)

Z, X, C: craft things to use them later

You can play in mobile, but it's a bit buggy

Press Left size to change paths, press right to stab, press craft to create things

Tips:

Try to create a potion if you have the chance, so you use it later (it costs 50 health and you recover 30 health)

Knife can kill enemies even if you're not stabbing, but if you have a shield, stab the enemies before they crash into your shield in order to gain extra points

Remember, the further you go (deeper) the faster can get in less time, but if you go up/down you'll run slower
